executable.title: Brain Extraction Tool
executable.description: This CLI module aims to extract the brain from the skull. This tool was intensively tested with T1 MRI images, but the pipeline could be applied to any other structural MRI images, namely T2 and PD. This module is an adaptation of ROBEX brain extraction tool, given by Iglesias, J. E. et al (2011). "Robust Brain Extraction Across Datasets and Comparison With Publicly Available Methods". IEEE Transactions on Medical Imaging, 30(9), 1617â€“1634. DOI:10.1109/TMI.2011.2138152
executable.contributor: Antonio Carlos da S. Senra Filho (University of Sao Paulo)
executable.acknowledgements: This work was partially funded by CNPq grant 201871/2015-7/SWE and CAPES.
